translation: 顯慶元年七月廿七日於長安大慈恩寺翻經院三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯弘法寺沙門嘉尚筆受大慈恩寺沙門明珠證義大慈恩寺沙門惠貴證義大慈恩寺沙門法祥證義西明寺沙門慧景證義大慈恩寺沙門神泰證義大慈恩寺沙門普賢證義大慈恩寺沙門善樂證義大慈恩寺沙門拪玄綴文大慈恩寺沙門靜邁綴文西明寺沙門慧立綴文西明寺沙門玄則綴文大慈恩寺沙門義褒正字大慈恩寺沙門玄應正字西明寺沙門神察執筆大慈恩寺沙門辯通執筆同州魏伐寺沙門海藏筆受大慈恩寺沙門神昉筆受西明寺沙門嘉尚筆受大慈恩寺沙門大乘光筆受夫物情斯感。
He's endowed with the teaching and awakened.
The great sage Exorcist.
It truly inspires doubters.
And the former maker translated the eon.
There's no record of how long it's been in existence.
As a result, later students accumulated doubts and harbored suspicions.
This is why I've written it down.
It's to demonstrate the faith of those who came here.
May the fellow who wrote it down be my companion.
comrade with the rest.
Perhaps it will last for a few eons.
Never be in doubt.

source_sentence: 大唐中大夫內侍護軍佛弟子觀自在。
translation: A disciple of the Buddha, Avalokitêśvara, a member of the inner guard of the great Tang court.
He respectfully writes a newly translated sūtra treatise on the western regions.
May he finish the rest of his life here.
His mind of enlightenment won't falter.
Perhaps he'll circulate them to places where they've never been heard before.
It's a secret fact that the Buddha's sun sinks in the west.
The true teaching has profoundly disappeared.
The stream of wisdom is gradually flowing eastward.
The teaching of images has only been transmitted.
It's a talisman for rare generations.
Its mysterious meaning is proclaimed in Pāyāsi.
It's an extraordinary treasure.
The Zhirei sprouts from the dragon palace.
It drains its raging fount.
It cuts off a raging river and passes far away.
He wanders through its mysterious circuit.
He leaves his decaying house and drives long.
He's the teacher Xuanzang.
He's the dragon elephant of the Śākyas and the dragon heron of Jōtan.
He was a dragon elephant of the Śākyamuni school and a heron of the Zhendan school.
He surpassed Mount Onion to pursue his training.
He brought the Sanskrit text and then circled back.
He killed a young man and took up a permanent position.
There are so many people who have spread the teachings.
It's fortunate that they've heard the right teaching before.
Their planted causes may be blurred.
Their innate qualities are not complete.
Now, I've used up an inch of this pay.
I'll make good on this mysterious teaching.

It's written with the mind and eyes.
I'll personally obtain a verbal decision.
Perhaps there'll be no misunderstanding.
Because of this, we're fortunate.
I'd like to offer my blessings.
Taizong Wendi emperor.

source_sentence: 即御　皇帝王公卿士。
translation: That is, he ruled the emperor, the princes, ministers, and scholars.
The six in-laws and relatives.
All the people of the country.
He breathed a sigh of relief with his practice.
They all equally perfumed and cultivated them.
They take advantage of this excellent foundation.
Then they'll ascend to right awakening.
